accuracy.description: The ratio between correct and total data the service received (%)

completeness.description: The ratio between received and expected number of data attributes sent to the service

duplicate_ratio.description: Ratio of duplicate entries in the data

error_ratios.description: Ratio of errors in the data

none_ratio.description: Ratio of none or empty entries in the data

null_correlations.description: Correlation between null or undefined entries in the data

null_count.description: Count of null or undefined entries in the data

total_duplicate.description: Total number of duplicate entries in the data

total_errors.description: Total number of errors as given by the user in the data

total_none.description: Total number of none or empty entries in the data

total_valid.description: Total number of valid entries in the data

accuracy.description: Can be measured in different ways such as confidence score in classification models

auc.description: The measure of the ability of a classifier to distinguish between classes and is used as a summary of the ROC curve

mse.description: Mean square error used for regression models

precision.description: The fraction of true positive responses over total number of positive responses

recall.description: The fraction of true positive responses over total number of correct responses

availability.description: The ratio between up time and down time of the service (%)

reliability.description: The ratio between correct and total service responses (%)

response_time.description: The response time of each microservice, measured by the time period between receiving and replying the request (s)
